title.rendered: Credential Evaluation Requirements for University of Regina – Faculty of Graduate Studies and Research (FGSR)

acf.intro_text: University of Regina – Faculty of Graduate Studies and Research (FGSR)
acf.main_content_item_1_text:
Follow the steps below before starting your application:

  1. Select Canada for your evaluation.
  2. Select WES Standard Application.
  3. Add University of Regina – Faculty of Graduate Studies and Research as a recipient.
  4. Select WES ICAP Course-by-Course as the evaluation type (required by FGSR).

Follow the country-specific document requirements and arrange for your documents to be delivered to WES.

Note: FGSR applicants must request the WES International Credential Advantage Package (ICAP) Course-by-Course report. If you have a prior WES report, you must upgrade to the WES ICAP Course-by-Course evaluation report.
acf.main_content_item_2_headline: What WES will do for you:
acf.main_content_item_2_text:
1. Verify your academic records.
  2. Prepare an official credential evaluation.
  3. Deliver your evaluation report and verified copies of your transcripts directly to University of Regina – Faculty of Graduate Studies and Research.
acf.main_content_item_3_text:
If you have any questions about WES or the evaluation process, please see our FAQ.

For detailed information about the University of Regina – Faculty of Graduate Studies and Research (FGSR) and its requirements, please visit their website.
